rooms.description: Two-car garage designed to accommodate two vehicles. Incorporates Vastu principles by ensuring the entry is from the east for auspiciousness.
Spacious entrance area with Bohemian elements like natural finishes and decorative tiles. Vastu principle: aligned with the North direction to encourage prosperity.
Open-plan living and dining space integrated with a Bohemian style using vibrant colors, textures and sustainable materials. Vastu-aligned seating area oriented towards the South for stability.
Functional kitchen designed in a modern yet bohemian style with an open view to the living space. Vastu guidelines recommend placing the stove and water element on opposite sides of the room.

Versatile studio bedroom designed for a duplex layout that flows seamlessly with adjoining open spaces; incorporates Bohemian decor, ample natural light from east windows (Vastu compliant) and flexible furniture arrangements.
Modern bathroom with integrated vanity and storage. Vastu recommendations for water-related fixtures placed in the North-East corner for energy flow.
